children.text:
- Fix more defects in Translate with Instant TTS 

--- v5.2.8 --- 

- Fix the broken links 
- Fix a defect rarely occurred on HTC/Sumsang devices 
- Fix the defect related to offline text to speech 
 
+ Press "Enter" key to lookup word or translate text instantly 
+ Dictionary, Translate and Speak functions all-in-one app 

+ Improve the Free Full Text Online Translation with Instant Text-to-speech for the available languages, such as: 
Chinese (Mandarin), Dutch (Netherlands), English (US), French (France), German (Germany), Italian (Italy), Japanese (Japan), Korean (South Korea), Polish (Poland), Portuguese (Portugal), Russian (Russia), Spanish (US) 

+ Re-define more languages for the offline text-to-speech, such as: 
Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese), Dutch (Netherlands), English (India, UK, US), French (Belgium, France), German (Germany), Italian (Italy), Japanese (Japan), Korean (South Korea), Polish (Poland), Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal), Russian (Russia), Spanish (Mexico, Spain, US) 

Check the availability of the above languages on your device now! 
 
 
Sincerely, 
The MLDTS Team
